I enabled full screen mode and then closed the browser before disabling it. Now when I open the browser, it is automatically in full screen mode, and I can not get it back to normal. If I try exiting full screen mode, it screws up the layout completely.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the browser
2. Switch to full screen mode
3. Close the browser
4. Re-open the browser

Actual Results:  
Exact same thing.
